skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit decreases the target's Turn Meter by 7.5% if the target is under a [Fear] or a [True Fear] debuff. 

Reduces the cooldown of this Champion's Taste of Despair [P] skill by 1 turn if this attack kills an enemy.
skills.name: Nightmare
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn and a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. 

Has a 75% chance of placing a [True Fear] debuff on 2 enemies for 1 turn if this attack kills an enemy. One [True Fear] debuff will be placed on the enemy with the lowest Turn Meter, while one will be placed on the enemy with the highest Turn Meter.
skills.name: Haunted Machete
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 35% of target's DEF if the target is under a [Fear] or a [True Fear] debuff.

Places a [Block Debuffs] buff for 1 turn, a 30% [Increase SPD] buff for 2 turns, and a [Revive On Death] buff for 2 turns on this Champion if this attack kills an enemy.
skills.name: Well-Used Axe
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 50% whenever an enemy’s HP drops below 20%.
skills.name: Taste of Despair [P]
